Detailed Description

Defines the data structure for stocks (groups of fish from a common release point with similar characteristics).

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct stock StockT

The general design is that there are a number of custom stocks, designated int the river description file, the data for which are gathered in the global stock_info struct below.

in addition, each species contains one Stock object, which is "generic" data for that species.

The key usage is that each release keeps a handle to one Stock object, either one of the custom globals or the generic from the appropriate species for that release.

Variable Documentation

StockT stock_defaults

Default values for StockT.

These disable as many features as possible and when an input file is written out, only values that differ from these defaults are written out. Thus, old parameters that are generally disabled are hidden.
